qaautomation.displayName: Testing Ruby with RSpec: The Complete Guide
qaautomation.subtitle: Using the RSpec testing framework

bulletPoints: Test-driven development principles to design and implement clean test specs in Ruby

Exploring the wide array of RSpec matchers available for use
